page.title: 12Penryn's Shopping Facilities
page.content: In{Penryn}we have a tiny town with shops that sell things that you might want urgently or you might just want some sweets.We have a butcher,a shop called{Spar,}this sells all sorts of things like sweets,meat,packets of soup and things from crisps to dog food. We have a shop that sells childrens toys and books and a shop that sells writing paper, stationery and things like that.{Penryn}shopping centre is very useful because people don't have to go all the way into the main town.
